data.name: Madelyne Pryor
data.description: A lovelorn clone of Jean Grey, Madelyne Pryor uses her superior psychic powers and sorcery to rain fury down on her opponents.

starItems.name: Madelyne Pryor
starItems.description: A lovelorn clone of Jean Grey, Madelyne Pryor uses her superior psychic powers and sorcery to rain fury down on her opponents.

2.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>30%</color> damage to primary target
Flip <color=#86e619>1</color> positive effect on primary target
On <color=#fff568>WAR DEFENSE</color>, flip <color=#86e619>1</color> additional positive effect on the primary target

3.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>120%</color> damage + flip <color=#86e619>1</color> random positive effect to a negative effect.

On <color=#fff568>WAR DEFENSE</color>, flip <color=#86e619>1</color> additional positive effect on the primary target.

4.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>150%</color> damage + flip <color=#86e619>1</color> random positive effect to a negative effect.

On <color=#fff568>WAR DEFENSE</color>, flip <color=#86e619>1</color> additional positive effect on the primary target.
4.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>40%</color> damage to primary target
On <color=#fff568>WAR DEFENSE</color>, flip <color=#86e619>2</color> additional positive effects on the primary target

5.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>190%</color> damage + flip <color=#86e619>1</color> random positive effect to a negative effect.

On <color=#fff568>WAR DEFENSE</color>, flip <color=#86e619>2</color> additional positive effects on the primary target.

6.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>240%</color> damage + flip <color=#86e619>1</color> random positive effect to a negative effect.

On <color=#fff568>WAR DEFENSE</color>, flip <color=#86e619>2</color> additional positive effects on the primary target.
6.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>60%</color> damage to primary target
On <color=#fff568>WAR DEFENSE</color>, flip <color=#86e619>3</color> additional positive effects on the primary target

7.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>300%</color> damage + flip <color=#86e619>1</color> positive effect.

On <color=#fff568>WAR DEFENSE</color>, flip <color=#86e619>3</color> additional positive effects on the primary target.

1.description:
Attack all enemies for <color=#86e619>80%</color> damage.

If Cyclops, Phoenix, or Dark Phoenix is an enemy, Bonus Attack all enemies for <color=#86e619>80%</color> damage.

Apply <color=#fff568>Offense Down</color> to all <color=#fff568>BRAWLER</color> and all <color=#fff568>BLASTER</color> enemies.
Apply <color=#fff568>Disrupted</color> to all <color=#fff568>PROTECTOR</color> and all <color=#fff568>CONTROLLER</color> enemies.
Apply <color=#fff568>Ability Block</color> to all <color=#fff568>SUPPORT</color> enemies.

This attack cannot be Counterattacked.
On <color=#fff568>WAR DEFENSE</color>, this attack is Unavoidable.
1.nextUpgrade: +<color=#86e619>30%</color> damage to primary and secondary attacks

2.description:
Attack all enemies for <color=#86e619>110%</color> damage.

If Cyclops, Phoenix, or Dark Phoenix is an enemy, Bonus Attack all enemies for <color=#86e619>110%</color> damage.

Apply <color=#fff568>Offense Down</color> to all <color=#fff568>BRAWLER</color> and all <color=#fff568>BLASTER</color> enemies.
Apply <color=#fff568>Disrupted</color> to all <color=#fff568>PROTECTOR</color> and all <color=#fff568>CONTROLLER</color> enemies.
Apply <color=#fff568>Ability Block</color> to all <color=#fff568>SUPPORT</color> enemies.

This attack cannot be Counterattacked.
On <color=#fff568>WAR DEFENSE</color>, this attack is Unavoidable.
2.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>30%</color> damage to primary and secondary attacks
On <color=#fff568>WAR DEFENSE</color>, apply <color=#fff568>Ability Block</color> to all enemy <color=#fff568>PROTECTORS</color>

3.description:
Attack all enemies for <color=#86e619>140%</color> damage.

If Cyclops, Phoenix, or Dark Phoenix is an enemy, Bonus Attack all enemies for <color=#86e619>140%</color> damage.

Apply <color=#fff568>Offense Down</color> to all <color=#fff568>BRAWLER</color> and all <color=#fff568>BLASTER</color> enemies.
Apply <color=#fff568>Disrupted</color> to all <color=#fff568>PROTECTOR</color> and all <color=#fff568>CONTROLLER</color> enemies.
Apply <color=#fff568>Ability Block</color> to all <color=#fff568>SUPPORT</color> enemies.

This attack cannot be Counterattacked.
On <color=#fff568>WAR DEFENSE</color>:
> This attack is Unavoidable.
> Apply <color=#fff568>Ability Block</color> to all enemy <color=#fff568>PROTECTORS</color>.
3.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>30%</color> damage to primary and secondary attacks
Apply <color=#fff568>Defense Down</color> to all enemies

4.description:
Attack all enemies for <color=#86e619>170%</color> damage + apply <color=#fff568>Defense Down</color>.

If Cyclops, Phoenix, or Dark Phoenix is an enemy, Bonus Attack all enemies for <color=#86e619>170%</color> damage.

Apply <color=#fff568>Offense Down</color> to all <color=#fff568>BRAWLER</color> and all <color=#fff568>BLASTER</color> enemies.
Apply <color=#fff568>Disrupted</color> to all <color=#fff568>PROTECTOR</color> and all <color=#fff568>CONTROLLER</color> enemies.
Apply <color=#fff568>Ability Block</color> to all <color=#fff568>SUPPORT</color> enemies.

This attack cannot be Counterattacked.
On <color=#fff568>WAR DEFENSE</color>:
> This attack is Unavoidable.
> Apply <color=#fff568>Ability Block</color> to all enemy <color=#fff568>PROTECTORS</color>.
4.nextUpgrade: +<color=#86e619>30%</color> damage to primary and secondary attacks

5.description:
Attack all enemies for <color=#86e619>200%</color> damage + apply <color=#fff568>Defense Down</color>.

If Cyclops, Phoenix, or Dark Phoenix is an enemy,  Bonus Attack all enemies for <color=#86e619>200%</color> damage.

Apply <color=#fff568>Offense Down</color> to all <color=#fff568>BRAWLER</color> and all <color=#fff568>BLASTER</color> enemies.
Apply <color=#fff568>Disrupted</color> to all <color=#fff568>PROTECTOR</color> and all <color=#fff568>CONTROLLER</color> enemies.
Apply <color=#fff568>Ability Block</color> to all <color=#fff568>SUPPORT</color> enemies.

This attack cannot be Counterattacked.
On <color=#fff568>WAR DEFENSE</color>:
> This attack is Unavoidable.
> Apply <color=#fff568>Ability Block</color> to all enemy <color=#fff568>PROTECTORS</color>.
5.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>50%</color> damage to primary and secondary attacks
Apply <color=#fff568>Defense Down</color>, <color=#fff568>Offense Down</color>, and <color=#fff568>Disrupted</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns
Apply <color=#fff568>Ability Block</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns to all <color=#fff568>SUPPORT</color> enemies

6.description:
Attack all enemies for <color=#86e619>250%</color> damage + apply <color=#fff568>Defense Down</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns.

If Cyclops, Phoenix, or Dark Phoenix is an enemy,  Bonus Attack all enemies for <color=#86e619>250%</color> damage.

Apply <color=#fff568>Offense Down</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns to all <color=#fff568>BRAWLER</color> and all <color=#fff568>BLASTER</color> enemies.
Apply <color=#fff568>Disrupted</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns to all <color=#fff568>PROTECTOR</color> and all <color=#fff568>CONTROLLER</color> enemies.
Apply <color=#fff568>Ability Block</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns to all <color=#fff568>SUPPORT</color> enemies.

This attack cannot be Counterattacked.
On <color=#fff568>WAR DEFENSE</color>:
> This attack is Unavoidable.
> Apply <color=#fff568>Ability Block</color> to all enemy <color=#fff568>PROTECTORS</color>.
6.nextUpgrade: +<color=#86e619>50%</color> damage to primary and secondary attacks

7.description:
Attack all enemies for <color=#86e619>300%</color> damage + apply <color=#fff568>Defense Down</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns.

If Cyclops, Phoenix, or Dark Phoenix is an enemy,  Bonus Attack all enemies for <color=#86e619>300%</color> damage.

Apply <color=#fff568>Offense Down</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns to all <color=#fff568>BRAWLER</color> and all <color=#fff568>BLASTER</color> enemies.
Apply <color=#fff568>Disrupted</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns to all <color=#fff568>PROTECTOR</color> and all <color=#fff568>CONTROLLER</color> enemies.
Apply <color=#fff568>Ability Block</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns to all <color=#fff568>SUPPORT</color> enemies.

This attack cannot be Counterattacked.
On <color=#fff568>WAR DEFENSE</color>:
> This attack is Unavoidable.
> Apply <color=#fff568>Ability Block</color> to all enemy <color=#fff568>PROTECTORS</color>.

1.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>200%</color> damage.

On <color=#fff568>WAR DEFENSE</color>:
> This attack targets the most injured non-summoned enemy. This attack can target Dark Phoenix.
> This attack cannot be blocked.
1.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>50%</color> damage to primary target
Prolong <color=#86e619>1</color> negative effect by <color=#86e619>1</color> on primary target

2.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>250%</color> damage + prolong the duration of <color=#86e619>1</color> random negative effect by <color=#86e619>1</color>.

On <color=#fff568>WAR DEFENSE</color>:
> This attack targets the most injured non-summoned enemy. This attack can target Dark Phoenix.
> This attack cannot be blocked.
2.nextUpgrade:
Flip <color=#86e619>1</color> positive effect to a negative effect on primary target
Prolong the duration of <color=#86e619>2</color> random negative effects by <color=#86e619>1</color> on primary target

3.description:
Flip <color=#86e619>1</color> positive effect on primary target.
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>250%</color> damage + prolong the duration of <color=#86e619>2</color> random negative effects by <color=#86e619>1</color>.

On <color=#fff568>WAR DEFENSE</color>:
> This attack targets the most injured non-summoned enemy. This attack can target Dark Phoenix.
> This attack cannot be blocked.
3.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>100%</color> damage to primary target
On <color=#fff568>WAR DEFENSE</color>, on Kill, generate <color=#86e619>2</color> Ability Energy to a random Mister Sinister ally

4.description:
Flip <color=#86e619>1</color> positive effect on primary target.
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>350%</color> damage + prolong the duration of <color=#86e619>2</color> random negative effects by <color=#86e619>1</color>.

On <color=#fff568>WAR DEFENSE</color>:
> This attack targets the most injured non-summoned enemy. This attack can target Dark Phoenix.
> On Kill, generate <color=#86e619>2</color> Ability Energy to a random Mister Sinister ally.
> This attack cannot be blocked.
4.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>100%</color> damage to primary target
Flip <color=#86e619>2</color> positive effects on primary target

5.description:
Flip <color=#86e619>2</color> positive effects on primary target.
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>450%</color> damage + prolong the duration of <color=#86e619>2</color> random negative effects by <color=#86e619>1</color>.

On <color=#fff568>WAR DEFENSE</color>:
>This attack targets the most injured non-summoned enemy. This attack can target Dark Phoenix.
> On Kill, generate <color=#86e619>2</color> Ability Energy to a random Mister Sinister ally.
> This attack cannot be blocked.
5.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>50%</color> damage to primary target
Flip <color=#86e619>3</color> positive effects on primary target
Prolong all negative effect on the primary target

6.description:
Flip <color=#86e619>3</color> positive effects on primary target.
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>500%</color> damage + prolong the duration of all negative effects by <color=#86e619>1</color>.

On <color=#fff568>WAR DEFENSE</color>:
> This attack targets the most injured non-summoned enemy. This attack can target Dark Phoenix.
> On Kill, generate <color=#86e619>2</color> Ability Energy to a random Mister Sinister ally.
> This attack cannot be blocked.
6.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>100%</color> damage to primary target
Flip all positive effects on primary target

7.description:
Flip all positive effects on primary target.
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>600%</color> damage + prolong the duration of all negative effects by <color=#86e619>1</color>.

On <color=#fff568>WAR DEFENSE</color>:
> This attack targets the most injured non-summoned enemy. This attack can target Dark Phoenix.
> On Kill, generate <color=#86e619>2</color> Ability Energy to a random Mister Sinister ally.
> This attack cannot be blocked.

1.description:
When an enemy attacks any Emma Frost, <color=#fff568>MARAUDER</color>, or Cloned ally below <color=#86e619>50%</color> Health, Mind Control the ally with the highest Damage to attack that enemy. The controlled character gains +<color=#86e619>10%</color> Damage for this attack.

Gain +<color=#86e619>20%</color> Focus. <color=#fff568>MARAUDER</color> allies gain +<color=#86e619>20%</color> Focus.
Gain +<color=#86e619>20%</color> Damage. <color=#fff568>MARAUDER</color> allies gain +<color=#86e619>20%</color> Damage.
1.nextUpgrade:
Gain +<color=#86e619>25%</color> chance to assist on non-attack abilities
On <color=#fff568>WAR DEFENSE</color>, gain +<color=#86e619>50%</color> Resistance per enemy <color=#fff568>BRAWLER</color>

2.description:
When an enemy attacks any Emma Frost, <color=#fff568>MARAUDER</color>, or Cloned ally below <color=#86e619>50%</color> Health, Mind Control the ally with the highest Damage to attack that enemy. The controlled character gains +<color=#86e619>10%</color> Damage for this attack.

Gain +<color=#86e619>25%</color> chance to assist on non-attack abilities.
Gain +<color=#86e619>20%</color> Focus. <color=#fff568>MARAUDER</color> allies gain +<color=#86e619>20%</color> Focus.
Gain +<color=#86e619>20%</color> Damage. <color=#fff568>MARAUDER</color> allies gain +<color=#86e619>20%</color> Damage.

On <color=#fff568>WAR DEFENSE</color>:
 > Gain +<color=#86e619>50%</color> Resistance per enemy <color=#fff568>BRAWLER</color>.
2.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>10%</color> Damage for controlled characters
On <color=#fff568>WAR DEFENSE</color>, lower Crit Chance by <color=#86e619>25%</color> for all <color=#fff568>MUTANT</color> enemies

3.description:
When an enemy attacks any Emma Frost, <color=#fff568>MARAUDER</color>, or Cloned ally below <color=#86e619>50%</color> Health, Mind Control the ally with the highest Damage to attack that enemy. The controlled character gains +<color=#86e619>20%</color> Damage for this attack.

Gain +<color=#86e619>25%</color> chance to assist on non-attack abilities.
Gain +<color=#86e619>20%</color> Focus. <color=#fff568>MARAUDER</color> allies gain +<color=#86e619>20%</color> Focus.
Gain +<color=#86e619>20%</color> Damage. <color=#fff568>MARAUDER</color> allies gain +<color=#86e619>20%</color> Damage.

On <color=#fff568>WAR DEFENSE</color>:
 > Gain +<color=#86e619>50%</color> Resistance per enemy <color=#fff568>BRAWLER</color>.
 > Lower Crit Chance by <color=#86e619>25%</color> for all <color=#fff568>MUTANT</color> enemies.
3.nextUpgrade:
On <color=#fff568>WAR DEFENSE</color>, on Spawn, fill Speed Bar by <color=#86e619>30%</color> for a random Stryfe ally
On <color=#fff568>WAR DEFENSE</color>, lower Crit Chance by +<color=#86e619>25%</color> for all <color=#fff568>MUTANT</color> enemies

4.description:
When an enemy attacks any Emma Frost, <color=#fff568>MARAUDER</color>, or Cloned ally below <color=#86e619>50%</color> Health, Mind Control the ally with the highest Damage to attack that enemy. The controlled character gains +<color=#86e619>20%</color> Damage for this attack.

Gain +<color=#86e619>25%</color> chance to assist on non-attack abilities.
Gain +<color=#86e619>20%</color> Focus. <color=#fff568>MARAUDER</color> allies gain +<color=#86e619>20%</color> Focus.
Gain +<color=#86e619>20%</color> Damage. <color=#fff568>MARAUDER</color> allies gain +<color=#86e619>20%</color> Damage.

On <color=#fff568>WAR DEFENSE</color>:
 > Gain +<color=#86e619>50%</color> Resistance per enemy <color=#fff568>BRAWLER</color>.
 > Lower Crit Chance by <color=#86e619>50%</color> for all <color=#fff568>MUTANT</color> enemies.
 > On Spawn, fill Speed Bar by <color=#86e619>30%</color> for a random Stryfe ally.
4.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>25%</color> chance to assist on non-attack abilities
+<color=#86e619>10%</color> Damage for controlled characters

5.description:
When an enemy attacks any Emma Frost, <color=#fff568>MARAUDER</color>, or Cloned ally below <color=#86e619>50%</color> Health, Mind Control the ally with the highest Damage to attack that enemy. The controlled character gains +<color=#86e619>30%</color> Damage for this attack.

Gain +<color=#86e619>50%</color> chance to assist on non-attack abilities.
Gain +<color=#86e619>20%</color> Focus. <color=#fff568>MARAUDER</color> allies gain +<color=#86e619>20%</color> Focus.
Gain +<color=#86e619>20%</color> Damage. <color=#fff568>MARAUDER</color> allies gain +<color=#86e619>20%</color> Damage.

On <color=#fff568>WAR DEFENSE</color>:
 > Gain +<color=#86e619>50%</color> Resistance per enemy <color=#fff568>BRAWLER</color>.
 > Lower Crit Chance by <color=#86e619>50%</color> for all <color=#fff568>MUTANT</color> enemies.
 > On Spawn, fill Speed Bar by <color=#86e619>30%</color> for a random Stryfe ally.
